short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FocusPrivacy is a browser extension that prevents websites from knowing if the window loses focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusPrivacy stops particularly invasive websites from seeing if you're on a different application or tab. 
Once installed, the extension simply starts workingâ€“ no configuration required.

FocusPrivacy is open source software. You can view the code here: https://github.com/AngeloD2022/FocusPrivacy
